column4: I am running Ubuntu on Virtual Box which is running in Debian x64.  I am having a strange problem where all my typing is very sluggish is Ubuntu.  Any ideas?
have you added virtualbox additions?
yes I have added
the VBOx additions
- strangely the problem is really bad on  the terminal
its a lot better for example on this IRC client
xchat
strange, ive always had good luck, i cant think of what it might be :(
- every other OS works fine... even XP!
what version of ubuntu?
hmm im at a loss, i have 10.10 in VM at work, everything works great
though that win7 host
which virtualbox chipset are you using?
The hardware is an I5-760 / 4 Gigs / I have 1 virtual CPU with VT-x enabed
i meant virtual chipset, virtualbox has 2
oh hang on..
piix3
ICH9 is the new one, might have better luck with that
OK will try...
on the next reboot :)
thanks for the suggestion
im only guessing; but its what ive been using lately with good results
